Header.title: Match with the best tutors
Header.paragraph: Akads helps you match with a tutor that is most suited for your child. Create an account now and have your first hour for FREE.

About.paragraph: We want to make it easy for parents to find tutors for their kids by combining the booking process, video chat, and online payments, all-in-one platform. Online tutorial sessions are conducted through ZOOM. We accept any mode of payment such as credit cards, payment apps, and bank transfers.

Testimonials.text: Everything that I need to get a tutor for my daughter, Martina, is in AKADS. They help support her by providing a tutor that can help with the lessons given online schooling.
Testimonials.name: Mommy Trixie

Testimonials.text: Ate Bea super helped me understand trigonometry more. She even gave me tips to help me remember the formulas.
Testimonials.name: Martina

Testimonials.text: ...It was really fulfilling to be able to teach Martina as she was able to understand our lesson on trigonometry. I do hope to continue teaching younger students in the future!
Testimonials.name: Tutor Bea

Testimonials.text: AKADS is the new normal for us. It compliments well with the online learning the school provides. Safe, easy and effective. Bonus part is when they started offering bundles! We are now sure we are booked and assured of our slot!
Testimonials.name: Mommy Didi

Testimonials.text: Tutor Karl helps me solve my Math homework using an online whiteboard!
Testimonials.name: Theodore

Testimonials.text: ...Having Akads as an opportunity to continue tutoring has been a big blessing! So far, me and my tutee have really progressed a lot. The growth is the same as it would have been if it were in person!
Testimonials.name: Tutor Karl

Features.title: Buy Hour Credits
Features.text: Buy 1 hour, 10 hour, or 15 hour sessions easily through multiple safe and secure payment methods.

Features.title: Book A Tutor
Features.text: Fill up a form and match with a tutor. You can chat with your tutor and send files.

Features.title: Start Your Online Session
Features.text: One-on-one sessions with an online whiteboard and screen share. If you liked your tutor, add them to your Favorites List and book them again in the future.

Benefits.title: No More Referrals
Benefits.text: We supply you with students who need your expertise through our data matching system.

Benefits.title: Earn Easily
Benefits.text: Easily bring in income while youâ€™re a student or fresh graduate just by tutoring

Benefits.title: Online Tutoring
Benefits.text: Distance in no longer a problem through online tutoring.
